metadata.feature_description: Configure module-specific settings including workflow, tokens, and display options

steps.action: Navigate to Module Settings > HTML Module Settings tab
steps.expected: HTML settings tab with Replace Tokens checkbox visible
steps.actual: HTML settings tab displayed with Replace Tokens checkbox
Replace Tokens checkbox verified as unchecked after reopening

steps.action: Change Search Description Length from 200 to 150

steps.actual: Search Description Length verified as 150 after reopening

steps.expected: Settings dialog opens with Module Settings tab
steps.actual: Settings dialog displayed with Module Settings tab

steps.action: Navigate to HTML Module Settings tab
steps.actual: HTML settings tab displayed with available settings

steps.action: Click Update button to save settings
Enter invalid non-numeric value 'abc' in Search Description Length field
steps.actual: Validation error message displayed: 'You need input a number of max description length'

steps.action: Enter empty value in Search Description Length field and save
steps.expected: Field should handle empty value gracefully (default or error)
steps.actual: Empty value saved and defaults to MAX_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH (100) when reopened

observations: Code suggests 'workflow assignment' feature exists (mentioned in suggested test scenarios), but no UI element found in HTML Module Settings - this feature may be configured elsewhere at the module instance level

Code suggests 'autosave' feature exists (mentioned in suggested test scenarios), but no UI element found in HTML Module Settings - autosave functionality may be handled by the inline editor automatically
Code suggests 'form decoration' feature exists (mentioned in suggested test scenarios), but no UI element found in HTML Module Settings
No 'Reset to defaults' button found in HTML Module Settings UI - settings must be manually changed back to defaults
Only two settings are available in the HTML Module Settings: Replace Tokens (checkbox) and Search Description Length (textbox)
When token replacement is enabled, the code automatically disables module caching (CacheTime = 0) to ensure tokens are always resolved at runtime
Search Description Length defaults to MAX_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH constant (100) when empty or not set
